mm.icl.hlc.ContextOntologyManager

Class ContextHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • mm.icl.hlc.ContextOntologyManager.AbstractHandler
      • mm.icl.hlc.ContextOntologyManager.ContextHandler

  • public class ContextHandler
extends AbstractHandler
    Context Handler: Subcomponent of the Context Ontology Manager which deals with the retrieval and storage of Context instances from/in the Context Ontology Storage.
    Since:
    2015-10-28
    Version:
    2.5
    Author:
    Claudia Villalonga and Muhammad Asif Razzaq

                       ContextOntology ont)
        Method to initialize the Context Handler.
        Specified by:
        initialize in class AbstractHandler
        Parameters:
        directory - Path to the directory where the Context Ontology Storage is deployed.
        ont - Context Ontology which represents the Mining Minds Context Model.

      • retrievePreviousHlcAndStoreNew

        public PhysicalActivityContext retrievePreviousHlcAndStoreNew(PhysicalActivityContext newHlc)
        Method to retrieve the previous instance of PhysicalActivity Context which is persisted in the Context Ontology Storage and to save the newly inferred PhysicalActivity Context instance.
        Specified by:
        retrievePreviousHlcAndStoreNew in class AbstractHandler
        Parameters:
        newHlc - Instance of PhysicalActivity Context which has been newly inferred.
        Returns:
        PhysicalActivity Context instance which is previous to newHlc.

      • storeNewLlc

        Method to store the newly mapped Low Level Context instance into the Context Ontology Storage.
        Specified by:
        storeNewLlc in class AbstractHandler
        Parameters:

      • finalizePreviousLlc

        public void finalizePreviousLlc(com.hp.hpl.jena.ontology.OntClass category,
                                com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource user,
                                com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Literal time)
        Method to finalize, i.e., to set the end time of, the previous Low Level Context instance stored in the Context Ontology Storage.
        Specified by:
        finalizePreviousLlc in class AbstractHandler
        Parameters:
        category - Ontology class defining the category (e.g., location, emotion, food or location) of the LLC which should be finalized.
        user - Ontology individual representing the user for which the LLC should be finalized.
        time - Literal describing the end time that should be set to the stored LLC.

      • retrieveConcurrentLlcAtStartTime

        public java.util.List<LowLevelContext> retrieveConcurrentLlcAtStartTime(LowLevelContext llc)
        Method to retrieve from the Context Ontology Storage the Low Level Context instances which are concurrent at the start time of a Low Level Context instance.
        Parameters:
        llc - Instance of Low Level Context.
        Returns:
        List of Low Level Context Instances which are concurrent at the start time of llc.

      • retrieveConcurrentLlcAtEndTime

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • retrieveLlcStartingWithinWindow

        public java.util.List<LowLevelContext> retrieveLlcStartingWithinWindow(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Literal windowStart,
                                                                       com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Literal windowEnd)
        Method to retrieve from the Context Ontology Storage all the Low Level Context instances which have their start time within a time window.
        Parameters:
        windowStart - xsd:dateTime typed Literal representing the start time of the window.
        windowEnd - xsd:dateTime typed Literal representing the end time of the window.
        Returns:
        List of Low Level Context instances which have their start time within the time window

      • retrieveLlcEndingWithinWindow

        public java.util.List<LowLevelContext> retrieveLlcEndingWithinWindow(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Literal windowStart,
                                                                     com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Literal windowEnd)
        Method to retrieve from the Context Ontology Storage all the Low Level Context instances which have their end time within a time window and which do not have a contiguous Low Level Context instance.
        Parameters:
        windowStart - xsd:dateTime typed Literal representing the start time of the window.
        windowEnd - xsd:dateTime typed Literal representing the end time of the window.
        Returns:
        List of Low Level Context instances which have their end time within the time window

      • retrieveContextInstancesMatchingSparqlQuery

        public static java.util.List<Context> retrieveContextInstancesMatchingSparqlQuery(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query sparqlQuery)
        Method to retrieve the Context instances stored in the Context Ontology Storage which match a SPARQL query.
        Parameters:
        sparqlQuery - SPARQL query which defines the constraints that the Context needs to meet.
        Returns:
        List of Context instances that match the sparqlQuery.

      • retrieveContextInstancesMatchingSparqlQuery

        public static java.util.List<Context> retrieveContextInstancesMatchingSparqlQuery(java.lang.String sparqlQueryString)
        Method to retrieve the Context instances stored in the Context Ontology Storage which match a SPARQL query.
        Parameters:
        sparqlQueryString - String encoding of the SPARQL query which defines the constraints that the Context needs to meet.
        Returns:
        List of Context instances that match the sparqlQueryString.
